alert.note: Alert for Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern New Hanover, Pender and northeastern Brunswick Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 446 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Burgaw, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burgaw, White Stocking, Penderlea, Maple Hill, Long Creek, Murray Town, Montague, Malpass Corner, Ashton, Willard, Rocky Point, Currie, Wards Corner, The Borough, Phoenix, Castle Hayne, St. Helena, Watha and Pender Memorial Hospital. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 388 and 412. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender
